meanings.definition: The act of taking back or continuing something after a pause.
meanings.sent1: The resumptions of the game after the rain delay excited the fans.
meanings.sent2: The resumptions of classes after the holiday break were smooth.
meanings.sent3: The resumptions of the music during the concert break brought smiles to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The resumptions of the story after the commercial break kept viewers engaged.
meanings.sent5: The resumptions of the train service made commuting easier for everyone.

meanings.definition: The act of beginning again after a break.
meanings.sent1: The resumptions of the project after the lunch break were productive.
meanings.sent2: The resumptions of the conversation after the interruption were seamless.
meanings.sent3: The resumptions of the game after the timeout brought cheers from the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The resumptions of the journey after the rest stop felt refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The resumptions of the movie after the intermission kept the audience engaged.
